short_summary: The Department of National Defence is issuing this Request for Proposal for the acquisition of 90 wood stoves Alpine CS14 or equivalent including delivery to St-Jean-Sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada
duration_in_months: Not for 'months' column. Provide the duration of the contract in months. Use standard time format i.e, 0-24 hours. (Example: 2022-10-15T10:00:00). Due_date = 2022-12-06T14:00:00.
